posts.text:
My first two experiences in this world were extended "Mature Woman Experiences" with Beautiful Anna. As noted in my earlier reviews, they were an absolutely wonderful initiation into this world, largely because we connected so well very quickly on an intellectual, emotional and physical basis and that we have a similar sense of humour. (She keeps telling me I'm "hilarious", and I keep telling her that's not the first adjective that a guy likes to hear!)
I had the opportunity to visit with Beautiful Anna again recently in another extended "Mature Woman Experience" just before she started her vacation.
I wanted our time together to be particularly special in that visit because she was winding down before her vacation and because I knew that her birthday was going to be in a few days. I brought along a hilarious birthday card, a Chapters gift card, some of her favourite snacks, some chocolates and 3 and 9 candles because she was going to be "39 and still holding".
Given the festive nature of the occasion, I had even gone out and bought a red thong for myself just for the visit to add to the levity-so much for the shy guy! I didn't look nearly as ridiculous as I feared, or so I told myself anyway-LOL!!
I had another reason that I wanted our time together to be truly special, though. I had decided that I was almost certainly "retiring" after a pending business trip to another city.
Although I had alerted Beautiful Anna in the summer that this was something I was looking at very seriously, the reality hit home for both of us when I disclosed this to her in person at the beginning of our session and handed her a thank you card. It included a note that expressed my gratitude for the enormous positive impact she has had in my life by helping me become much more confident and competent as a sensual being and in helping me become a better person who is much more open-minded and less judgmental. I also noted that there will also always be a little part of her with me and that I will often think back very fondly about our visits.
I had thought that our prior experiences were wonderful.
I was so wrong.
I was about to discover what wonderful truly was....
If I had to choose a single word for the dynamic between us from early in our first meeting through to today, it would be "natural". Although the relationship obviously has boundaries, the level of trust and true communication during our time together saw Beautiful Anna seeing behind my masks and understanding me on a much deeper level than almost everyone I have ever met. And the nature of our discussions is that I have what I think is a pretty good sense of her as well, although certainly on a lesser level.
As was the case in our prior visits, we spoke openly about a range of topics and laughed very easily. This was even during private moments when, for some reason that took both of us quite by surprise, she started discussing religion of all things in ways that broke us both up!
The dynamic was very different from our prior visits, though. This was partially because of the foundation of comfort we had created in our prior visits and partially because of the circumstances of the day. We were both totally present in the moment, and my confidence and comfort with her had never been higher than it was during this time together. For the first time, I felt like a full partner in the adventure, rather than still a bit of a student in the presence of his mentor.
Each of us was totally committed to celebrate the day, who we were and what we had shared and were sharing, while knowing that these were experiences that we would never share this way again.
Without disclosing any details about those private moments, those three hours were the greatest sensual experience of my life, and I will always treasure them.
As I noted in my prior reviews, Beautiful Anna is truly beautiful on many levels. She is one of the most genuine people I have ever met. She is intelligent, articulate, nice, funny, playful, refreshingly honest, supportive, caring and classy, and has a natural ability to understand individual needs. And the packaging is great too!
Whether we ever meet again in different circumstances or not, she has touched me in ways in which I am proud to consider her a friend.
I have been with seven wonderful women in my journey of self-discovery through this world, and each has become a special part of who I have become in their own ways. Beautiful Anna, though, was my first and, given the genuine connection between us, will always be my favourite.
I hope that she remembers me fondly and that she smiles sometimes when she considers how she has changed a life in such a major way now that I have flown so much more confidently from the comfort of the nest.
I was so fortunate to begin my journey into this world with her....

Recalling as best as I am able, they make it clear that initial contact is via PM on PERB.  The criteria for them to accept you as a customer is that you have been a member for at least a year and some history of writing some reviews.
Plain and simple, they are doing this to protect their asses.  Not a bad idea.  Using you as an example, you have been a member for 10 or less days and only now do you have your first post.  For all they know, you may be sitting at VPD trying to set up the place.   Or, if they see your posting history they may see you as the type of a-hole they do not wish to have as a customer/

This board has been really helpful over the past couple of years, so I wanted to share some of my experiences that will hopefully be helpful to other women like me (I know you’re out there!).
I’m in my late forties, and until two years ago, my only sexual experience was with my husband. We’d been monogamous for 20+ years, but had often fantasized about group sex and talked about making it a reality at some point.
When we decided to move ahead, we wanted to take it slow, giving ourselves time to savour new experiences, talk things over, and work through our feelings. Seeing professionals was a good way to have a lot of choice and control over our encounters, ease our way into the “firsts,” and keep things just about sex and not romance.
Jumping into a threesome felt too overwhelming when I had never even kissed another person! So we began by each going out for solo sensual massage. After a few months, we felt ready for our first couples’ massage. We continued to see massage providers on our own, and about six months later we had our first couples’ session with a full-service provider.
Out of all the people I’ve seen, here are my recommendations. I’m not going to go into detail about rates, services, and locations, but I’ve linked to their info.
Massage providers
Aurora
(2862) made me feel comfortable from the moment we met. She was kind and friendly to a first-timer, and we had easy, natural conversations. Her massage skills are top notch, and the sessions were meditative and erotic. I saw her multiple times on my own and also had a lovely couples’ session with all the focus on me. I feel really lucky to count her as my initiation.
Aurora Roberts
(6917) is such a unique provider. I’ve seen her for Level 1 and Level 2 sex and intimacy coaching, and she brings such an authentic and intuitive spirit to the experience. She takes a structured but improvisational approach, asks wonderful questions, and really held space for my explorations. If you love therapy, you’ll love sessions with Aurora Roberts - the dialogue is just as good as the physical experience (which is to say, very good!)
FS providers
Charlee!!!
Charlee Beckett
was fantastic, amazing fun. We had a couples’ session with her initially, and she picked up on exactly what we wanted and led the way with a very interactive and delightful threesome. I also saw her on my own for a quieter, more intimate experience. She made me feel seen and special, and I really cherish the connection.
Silvia at Asian Fever
. Wowee. Our threesome with Silvia was something else. Deliciously enthusiastic and intense. Definitely one to work up to! But it felt really good to have developed the confidence to match her energy.
To any women reading this, feel free to DM me if you have more questions and I’m happy to share behind the scenes.

First of all DongGuan(东莞) is a city in the GuangDong(广东) province in China.
GuangDong as a province doesn't really have any special links to the sex trade, but it's one of the biggest provinces in China and it's famous for the local tongue: Cantonese. DongGuan on the other hand, is just a small city without any significant industries, but it is known across asia as the capital city for adult services. They went so far as developing a unique way of proceeding with the session, hence the name: DongGuan style service or DG style service (莞式服务). It usually contains 36 different steps or moves and usually last minimum 2 hours( some places has more than 36 moves), cat bath is one of the famous ones amongst the 36 moves. It also includes other famous moves like the hot tea service, handstand bj, several different kinds of rimming and so on.
Normally the girls need to get trained for 1 to 3 months by a famous and recognized massage parlor before they can call themselves DG Style Masseuse, and only then they are allowed to look for work else where as a DG Style Masseuse.
https://www.laonanren.com/news/2015-05/99967p2.htm
Google can translate the page and you will understand most of it. This is the basic 36 steps for DG style. Different parlors have their own add ons but to call DG style one must have at least these basic 36 steps. I haven't been back to DongGuan since the crackdown but this is the check list.
http://blog.sina.com.cn/s/blog_869f978a0102wbex.html
This one is one of the newer and extended versions. The basics are the same and the name is still called "Guan's style 36 steps" which is the actual official full name for DG style.
The Asian girls I have seen in Vancouver most likely have worked in small parlors in HongKong or GuanDong and has not gone through the whole training to become a real DG style masseuse, also to perform a real DG style service is very time consuming plus many of the services require special equipments. They will do some of the famous DG moves but not the real deal, still enjoyable though some of them. I personally don't care much about all the fancy moves but it's quite an eye opener if you've never experienced it before.
On a side note, the massage parlors in DongGuan can be massive and easily have over 100 girls in their lineups. The parlors normally don't look like much on the outside and usually are hidden in a maze of back alleys, but once you get inside it's like a palace. Unfortunately in 2014 there was a major crackdown in DongGuan and the local industry has not been the same since. But back in the days it was truly glorious and magnificent!
I hope that clears it up for anyone was wondering about the DG style (莞式服务)
